Mangle::Input::EventList

std::vector< Filter > list

Detailed Description

And Event handler that distributes each event to a list of other handlers. Supports filtering events by their Type parameter.

Member Function Documentation

void Mangle::Input::EventList::add ( EventPtr  e,
int  flags = EV_ALL 
) [inline]
virtual void Mangle::Input::EventList::event ( Type  type,
int  index,
const void *  p 
) [inline, virtual]

Called upon all events. The first parameter give the event type, the second gives additional data (usually the local keysym or button index as defined by the driver), and the pointer points to the full custom event structure provided by the driver (the type may vary depending on the EventType, this is defined in the Driver documentation.)

Implements Mangle::Input::Event.
